MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH45 postcode area of Wallasey, affecting properties in Warwick Drive, Seabank Road and surrounding streets. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of work required and our team is now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3AM. We will update this message if the information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:50PM on Saturday 23rd January 2021
